comment: used to describe alleles, RFLP's,and other naturally occurring mutations and  polymorphisms; variability arising as a result of genetic manipulation (e.g. site directed mutagenesis) should be described with the misc_difference feature; use /replace="" to annotate deletion, e.g. variation   4..5 /replace=""
definition: a related strain contains stable mutations from the same gene (e.g., RFLPs, polymorphisms, etc.) which differ from the presented sequence at this location (and possibly others);
